revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Conceptronic |model=C300BRS4 |revision=A v2 |series=N300 |est_reoease_date=04/2010 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Tenda |type=wireless router |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT3052F |cpu1_cspeed=384 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=KH |fla1_model=KH29LV320DBTC-70G |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9812G6IH-75 |ram1_num=2 |serial=yes |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3052F |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |802dot11_protocols=bgn |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.3;Ralink UBoot 3.3; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.23; |tp_firmware=DD-WRT, OpenWrt <!--(19.07)--> }} {{TagLine|N300 Wireless Router}} :[http://www.conceptronic.net/site/desktopdefault.aspx?tabindex=2&tabid=420&pc=C300BRS4A Support page]
The data for this entry is based on [http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=70848 this DD-WRT forums post]. :Per this post, the device is a [[Tenda]] product.
The board is similar to other RT305x Tenda devices such as :the [[Nexxt Solutions Nebula 150]] and the [[Tenda W268R (earlier)|Tenda W268R]].
Guide for firmware backup, installation of [https://github.com/vvigilante/c300bsr4a-firmware DD-WRT and OpenWrt].
